title: Industrial Revolution and British coal deposits

content.question: The beginning of the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain was most influenced by which of the following factors?

choices.label: The amount and location of British petroleum reserves
The location and large number of British coal deposits
The aggressive promotion of industrialization by George III
The spread of cotton cultivation in southern England

content.answer: The location and large number of British coal deposits

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
